heroSection.description: This image showcases the expertise of our plumbers in residential plumbing services. It features a picturesque lakeside property with a mini excavator in the foreground, working on installing or repairing underground piping.
heroSection.callToAction: Upgrade your home's plumbing system with our professional residential plumbing services. Contact us today for a free consultation.

heroSection.description: This image highlights our expertise in landscaping and outdoor plumbing projects. It shows a well-manicured lawn with a trench dug for installing new piping or drainage systems.
heroSection.callToAction: Enhance your outdoor living spaces with our professional landscaping and irrigation services. Get a free quote today.

heroSection.description: This image showcases our expertise in commercial and industrial plumbing projects. It features a large-scale excavation site with heavy machinery and piping installations.
heroSection.callToAction: Trust our experienced team for all your commercial and industrial plumbing needs. Contact us for a comprehensive project evaluation.

aboutUsSection.description: This image showcases the skill and dedication of our plumbers. It depicts two professionals working in a confined space, demonstrating their commitment to tackling challenging plumbing tasks.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image effectively highlights the expertise and professionalism of our team, making it an ideal choice for the About Us section.

aboutUsSection.description: This image showcases the attention to detail and quality workmanship our team provides. It features a well-organized basement with a newly installed water heater and piping system.
aboutUsSection.reason: This image demonstrates our commitment to delivering high-quality plumbing solutions, making it a great addition to the About Us section.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Tyler Croft
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I HIGHLY recommend Cochran brothers plumbing and gas! I called Blake at 7pm and he was at my house within 30 minutes.. Our lines were clogged and he had it unclogged in a very short time! He is very skilled and professional in his work and is very reasonable in his pricing! Thank you blake for such quick and excellent work! I will recommend you to everyone I know!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Gail Shields
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: The Cochran Brothers accomplished a task that others had deemed impossible. My mother had long desired a gas stove, and today, the Cochran Brothers made her dream a reality. Their exceptional professionalism and honesty have undoubtedly earned them more customers. I highly recommend their services. They responded promptly to my inquiry, demonstrating their reliability. I am grateful to Steven Butler for the recommendation.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kaleigh Pledger
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
Had a great experience with Blake Cochran when I needed a rusted out, leaky pipe repaired/replaced!

Quick response to my inquiries, easy to communicate with, honest and open about the prices and the process, and showed up fast to fix the issue! Thanks so much for the good work, Blake!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Brandon Bynum
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Amazing experience! Blake was out here quickly! Communicated the entire time ! Was the best plumber experience we have ever had. Very nice guy, extremely kind and respectful.  10/10 highly recommend. 😊
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Mary Iris Ellis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
If you need a plumber, I HIGHLY recommend Blake Cochran from Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas LLC.
I called him last week about a shower valve leak, and he came by within hours to come check it out and gave me a FREE estimate. Blake showed me the possible causes of the leak, and then provided me with different options for the repair. He gave me a reasonable price, so we scheduled the job. He arrived ON TIME and was ready to get to work thinking the whole faucet would need to be replaced and the tile would need to be cut out. Once he started the job, he was HONEST and explained that some simple parts were all that were needed to repair the leak which LOWERED the cost significantly. He is organized, and the invoice was easy to pay right then by credit card with an instant digital receipt for my records.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Barbara Rothschild
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Amazing service and repair. Would highly, highly  recommend the Cochran Brothers for any plumbing needs/repairs!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jennifer Greene
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great service! Will definitely use again!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Peggy Fields
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
My elderly mom lives in Gadsden and a water leak had dripped downstairs into her den. She did not know what was wrong. I tried to find someone who could come soon to find the leak and fix it. Many plumbers do not return calls or are booked out for days. Jonathan at Machen did return my call and said to call Cochran Brothers. I am so glad I did! He came out the very next morning at 8:30 and said it was the toilet tank upstairs. He replaced the toilet that same morning. We will always use Cochran for our plumbing problems.
Another handyman had looked upstairs and wanted to tear out the tile wall. I am so glad we didn't do that! It's best to call a licensed plumber and I recommend Cochran Brothers.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas

aboutUs: At Cochran Brothers Plumbing and Gas, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals dedicated to providing top-notch plumbing and gas services to the Gadsden and Etowah County areas. Our expertise spans a wide range of services, from general plumbing repairs and installations to specialized gas-related work. With a strong local presence and a commitment to excellence, we strive to deliver reliable solutions tailored to your unique needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing and gas company with a proven track record of exceptional service.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured professionals adhering to the highest industry standards and safety protocols.
Prompt and efficient service, with a commitment to minimizing disruptions and ensuring your complete satisfaction.
Comprehensive solutions backed by extensive knowledge and the latest techniques in plumbing and gas services.
